survmod:Longbow.NAME: Longbow
survmod:Longbow.FLAVOR: The last thing they'll never see.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 additional #yDistance. NL While in Long Range, gain #b3 #yStrength. NL While in Close Range, lose #b1 #yStrength.

survmod:GoodBoy.NAME: Good Boy
survmod:GoodBoy.FLAVOR: He's only the best boy in the whole wide world? Isn't he?! Yes he is!
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play an #yAttack each turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

survmod:SharpenedDagger.NAME: Sharpened Dagger
survmod:SharpenedDagger.FLAVOR: Good for skinning beasts, whittling new arrows, or slicing someone that gets too close.

survmod:ShotGlass.NAME: Shot Glass
survmod:ShotGlass.FLAVOR: A reimagined spyglass strapped to the side of your bow. Doubles as a drink holder...?
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards with 'shot' in the name deal #b3 additional damage.

survmod:TrapManual.NAME: Trap Manual
survmod:TrapManual.FLAVOR: You should never forget the manual for your complex machinery.

survmod:SignalFlare.NAME: Signal Flare
survmod:SignalFlare.FLAVOR: Not really it's intended use, but to survive, you've got to improvise.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you apply #b10 #yMarked each turn, gain [E] .

survmod:IronskinOutfit.NAME: Ironskin Outfit
survmod:IronskinOutfit.FLAVOR: It may slow you down, but it gives you a different kind of survivability...
DESCRIPTIONS: When you receive attack damage in Close Range, gain #b5 #yPlated #yArmor. Lose #b1 more #yDistance at the start of each turn.

survmod:RunningShoes.NAME: Running Shoes
survmod:RunningShoes.FLAVOR: You ought to move at a higher velocity than normal.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you gain #yDistance each turn, increase the #yDistance gained by #b1.

survmod:InnateMutation.NAME: Innate Mutation
survmod:InnateMutation.FLAVOR: A symbol of ever-shifting and adaptation to your surroundings.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you draw a #yStatus or #rCurse card each turn, draw #b1 card.

survmod:AdvancedEvolution.NAME: Advanced Evolution
survmod:AdvancedEvolution.FLAVOR: When you're pushed to your limit, you start to go beyond what you thought was possible...
DESCRIPTIONS: []. Whenever you draw a #yStatus or #rCurse card, draw #b1 card. The first time you draw a #yStatus or #rCurse card in a turn, gain [E].
